Package statistics

Class StatesGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • statistics.StatesGraphics
  • public class StatesGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gets creates graohics for the individual state classes including graphs and statistics.
    Author:
    nodoka shibasaki

      • predictData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> predictData()
        predicts data for the next 14 days based on the fully vaccinated population, vaccinated once population and the spread rate of covid-19. It also subtracts the patients from 14 days ago because the average cure/death rate is 14 days.
        Returns:
        array of predicted data sets

      • createGraph

        public void createGraph​(processing.core.PApplet p,
                        double x,
                        double y,
                        java.lang.String stateName)
        draws graph by figuring out all points of where the graph needs to be plotted.
        Parameters:
        p - PApplet graph is being drawn on
        x - x coordinate of the left up corner of where the graph is drawn
        y - y coordinate of the left up corner of where the graph is drawn
        stateName - name of state graph is being created for
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
